===Etymology===
From {{etyl|niv|ja|sort=くずり}}<ref name="KJE">{{R:Kojien}}</ref><ref name="Nipponica">'''1984''', {{lang|ja|[[w:日本大百科全書|日本大百科全書：ニッポニカ]]}} (''Nippon Dai Hyakka Zensho: Nipponica'', “[[w:Encyclopedia Nipponica|Encyclopedia Nipponica]]”) (in Japanese), [[w:Tokyo|Tōkyō]]: [[w:Shogakukan|Shogakukan]], relevant text online [https://kotobank.jp/word/%E3%82%AF%E3%82%BA%E3%83%AA-55382#E6.97.A5.E6.9C.AC.E5.A4.A7.E7.99.BE.E7.A7.91.E5.85.A8.E6.9B.B8.28.E3.83.8B.E3.83.83.E3.83.9D.E3.83.8B.E3.82.AB.29 here].</ref> {{m|niv|к’узр̌|tr=k’uzrš}}.

The kanji spelling is an example of {{ateji|sort=くずり}}, used both for the sound values, and for the meanings:
* {{m|ja|屈|tr=kuzu|pos=irregular [[音読み#Japanese|on'yomi]]||[[stooped]], [[bent]] [[over]]}}
* {{m|ja|狸|tr=ri||[[raccoon dog]]|pos=[[音読み#Japanese|on'yomi]]}}
